about_the_game:
Raccoon Roller is a physics based platform racer that challenges your creative thinking and mechanical skill. Using rockets and grapples find the fastest way through levels to climb ranks on the leaderboard.


FULL GAME FEATURES:

  • Challenging but rewarding twin stick style platform racing.

  • 40 levels with various routes to discover and medals to earn.

  • Unlock cosmetics through challenges and exploration.

  • Leaderboard support with optional friends filtering.

  • Steam achievements.

DEMO FEATURES:

  • 5 levels from the full game with medals to earn.

name: Raccoon Roller Demo
short_description: Armed with your trusty grapple cannon, race your way through the city's raccoon built obstacle courses and climb your way to top spot on the leaderboards.
